CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​Class
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPage
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​Output.​Components.​HTMLTopicPages.​Class

Creates a HTMLTopicPage for a class.

Threading: Not Thread Safe

This class is only designed to be used by one thread at a time.

Functions
Class
public Class (
Builders.HTML htmlBuilder,
int classID = 0,
ClassString classString = default(ClassString)
)

Creates a new class topic page.  Which features are available depend on which parameters you pass.

  • If you pass a ClassString AND a class ID, all features are available immediately.

  • If you only pass a ClassString, then only the path properties are available.

  • If you only pass a class ID, then only the database functions are available.

    • The path properties will be available after one of the database functions is called as they will look up the ClassString.

    • It is safe to call HTMLTopicPage.Build() when you only passed a class ID.

Database Functions
GetTopics
public override List<Topic> GetTopics (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Topics in the class.

If the CodeDB.Accessor doesn't have a lock this function will acquire and release a read-only lock.  If it already has a lock it will use it and not release it.

GetLinks
public override List<Link> GetLinks (
CodeDB.Accessor accessor,
CancelDelegate cancelDelegate
)

Retrieves the Links appearing in the class.

If the CodeDB.Accessor doesn't have a lock this function will acquire and release a read-only lock.  If it already has a lock it will use it and not release it.

public override HTMLTopicPage GetLinkTarget (
Topic targetTopic
)
